price: 100 où ces derniers pousseront d’horribles soupirs et ne pourront rien entendre[864].
arabic: لَهُمۡ فِيهَا زَفِيرٞ وَهُمۡ فِيهَا لَا يَسۡمَعُونَ
footnotes: [864] Compte tenu des affres qu’ils devront subir.

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: lahum fīhā zafīrun wahum fīhā lā yasmaʿūna
